Class GrpcStatusException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcStatusException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class GrpcStatusException extends RuntimeException
A GrpcStatus in exception form.

    • fromThrowable

      public static GrpcStatusException fromThrowable(Throwable t)
      Translates a Throwable into a GrpcStatusException.
      Parameters:
      t - the throwable.
      Returns:
      GrpcStatusException with mapped GrpcStatus or GrpcStatusCode.UNKNOWN status with the throwable as the cause.
